import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import Header2 from './../layout/header2'; import Footer1 from './../layout/footer1'; import Bottom from './../element/bottom'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Sidebar from '../layout/sidebar'; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Modal, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import {Constants} from '../../Constants' function Wallet() { const wallet = useSelector(state => state.wallet.wallet) const cards = useSelector(state => state.accounts.cards) const [currencyID, setCurrencyID] = useState(undefined) const [withdrawAmount, setWithdrawAmount] = useState(undefined) const [depositModalOpen, setDepositModalOpen] = useState(false) const openDepositModal = (currency_id) => { setDepositModalOpen(true) setCurrencyID(currency_id) }; const closeDepositModal = () => setDepositModalOpen(false);; const [withdrawModalOpen, setWithdrawModalOpen] = useState(false) const openWithdrawModal = (currency_id) => { setWithdrawModalOpen(true) setCurrencyID(currency_id) }; const closeWithdrawModal = () => setWithdrawModalOpen(false);; return ( <>
